@graph.headline: Creating Content For Blog Posts Using AI – SurferSEO + Custom GPTs For 70+ Content Scores
@graph.description: Complete guide to using AI tools including SurferSEO and Custom GPTs to create high-quality blog content that achieves 70+ content scores and improves organic search rankings.

@graph.name: How to Create AI-Generated Blog Content with SurferSEO and ChatGPT
@graph.description: Step-by-step process for generating high-quality blog content using AI tools to achieve 70+ SurferSEO scores

step.name: Identify Topic Structure
step.text: Identify the position within the website using root, seed, and node concept for semantic relevance

step.name: Conduct Topic Research
step.text: Use Ahrefs or SEMrush to research keywords and identify search volume for your chosen node

step.name: Analyze Competitors
step.text: Research competitor content and search intent using Location Guard and Google search

step.name: Create Content Outline
step.text: Use SurferSEO and Custom GPT to generate content outline and extract NLP keywords

step.name: Generate Content
step.text: Use Custom GPT to create content incorporating NLP keywords and meeting word count requirements

step.name: Optimize Content Score
step.text: Paste content into SurferSEO editor and optimize to achieve 70+ content score

step.name: Publish with SEO Best Practices
step.text: Create optimized URL, SEO title, and H1 tag following the three pillars of publishing

@graph.name: SEO and AI Content Creation Terminology

hasDefinedTerm.name: Root Topic
hasDefinedTerm.description: The most foundational topic of a website that defines its primary subject matter

hasDefinedTerm.name: Seed Topic
hasDefinedTerm.description: Sub-topics or categories that are directly relational to the root topic

hasDefinedTerm.name: Node Topic
hasDefinedTerm.description: Detailed topics that sit under each seed topic in the website hierarchy

hasDefinedTerm.name: NLP Keywords
hasDefinedTerm.description: Natural Language Processing keywords identified by SurferSEO for content optimization

hasDefinedTerm.name: Content Score
hasDefinedTerm.description: SurferSEO metric measuring content optimization quality, with 70+ being optimal
